description: This work represents this constant and incessant movement of becoming through an endless animation in which different kinds of noises mix at different scales. The movement comes from the use of a 3D noise field in which time flows along the third coordinate. This contributes to the feeling of a flowing organic form in constant motion.Technical specs - Real time endless generative animation HTML, VanillaJS, WebGL (no external libraries) Resolution agnostic, it can render at any resolution and aspect ratio - 10 KB - 100% on-chainTraits - Palette: 20 palettes - Grid: 0, 1, 2 (no grid, grid A, grid B) - Scale: 1 - 4 - Detail: 0, 1, 2 (kind of noise at finer scale) - Shading: 0, 1 (false, true)INTERACTION[s] save png at 3840x2160
name: Flowing
